item.description:
TC: Gail gailmwalker@yahoo.com 617 484-4259 or
Brian briansaper@yahoo.com 617 489-4651
EVENT: We'll meet in Arlington Center and bike up the trail
through Lexington to the bikeway end in Bedford then just
a bit further to have lunch at The Great Wall (Chinese food)
in Bedford. After lunch, we'll bike back to Arlington.
Please make sure your bike is in working condition and
you MUST wear a helmet.
Total mileage is about 17 miles. Pace 10-12 mph.
RSVP: By Oct 10th at 7pm to Gail or Brian. Exact meeting location sent to those who RSVP.
MEET: at 10:30 AM, ready to ride. Rain cancels.
COST: Bring money for lunch plus $5 for nonmembers.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the Trip's Coordinators (TCs) to make plans

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: BIKING ON THE MINUTEMAN BIKEWAY
